name: bible-reader-tracker
description: Track progress reading chapters and books of the Bible

scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run minify:js -s && npm run minify:css -s && npm run sw
scripts.copy: mkdir -p docs && cp index.html docs/ && cp *.png docs/ && cp *.svg docs/ && cp -r images docs/ && cp *.xml docs/ && cp favicon.ico docs/ && cp manifest.json docs/ && npm run copy-dependencies
scripts.copy-dependencies: cp node_modules/idb-keyval/dist/idb-keyval-iife.min.js docs/ && cp node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre.min.css docs/ && cp node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre-icons.min.css docs/

author: ciwchris
